itemstatuslong: Oops! Something didn't look right. Please submit another application. Be sure to complete your Social Security number, birthdate, Graduation year, a dependable phone number and email address.
I have some questions about your application. Please call the Director of Admissions, Chris Hughes, at 870-236-6901
Thank you for sending your HS transcripts, shot records and ACT/SAT scores. They have been processed. Please remember to have an officical copy sent to us AFTER graduation.

You have to ask your counselor to send your transcripts, shot records and ACT scores. They can be scanned and emailed to the Director of Admissons, Chris Hughes, at chughes@crc.edu. They can also be mailed to 100 College Dr., Paragould, AR 72450
Congratulations! You have been accepted to Crowley's Ridge College. A letter has been sent via email and regular mail to the addresses provided on your application.
The FAFSA is the Free Application for Federal Student Aid. You can complete the FAFSA at https://www.fafsa.gov. You need to have it completed by July 14th, 2017.
Your FAFSA has been completed and processed. Please check the Financial Aid tab for more information and your award letter
Final transcripts must be sealed, stamped and sent by your high school.

Official copies of your transcripts need to be sent to CRC. You must send them from every college you have attended or from which you have received finanical aid. Please list all the colleges/universities that you have attended.
Your Official college transcripts have been received and processed
Dual Enrollment or concurrent credit classes are college level classes taken during high school.
Your transcript has been received and proccesed.
Your dorm fee has been processed and placed toward your account.
Your offiical high school transcript has been received.
If you know someone that you would like to room with, please let me know. If you don't know anyone, the Admissions department will do their best to room you with someone that you will get along with.
$100 non-refundable dorm fee that is part of your room/board.
